ygData.subject: Re: Charm vs. Fear + Chain
ygData.msgSnippet: ... It seems to depend on the type of mob.  At L34, our group had two sonic bats dumped on us by someone else.  Both were red to me.  I fired up Screech out of
ygData.messageBody:
On Mon, 4 Oct 1999, Llewrend Lynnhaven wrote:
>
> Fear and Chain work well on blues and white, but not
> real well on yellows, and almost not at all on reds.

It seems to depend on the type of mob. At L34, our group had
two sonic bats dumped on us by someone else. Both were red to
me. I fired up Screech out of reflex, and both bats went
running (flapping?). Our entire party made it out alive,
despite it being the first time in Sol B for two of them.

> At level 30 I find one of my favorite pasttimes when
> my friends aren't on is to charm kill hill giants in
> rathe mountains. Very red. And I probably take more
> risks than I need to, mainly due to being lazy.
>
> [description snipped]

That's almost exactly what I do. Problem has been finding two
giants.

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
